text: (He muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama) tyasa kitabala'i padhne garnus, juna tapa'inla'i ‘‘vahya’’ dvara patha'i'eko cha, ra namaja kayama garnus. Nihsandeha namajale aslilata ra naramro kurabata rokdacha. Ra avasya allahako smarana garnu ta atyanta thulo kuro ho. Timi je gardaichau allaha jandacha
